snippet: For someone who was the only man to beat world number one Novak Djokovic in a grand slam in 2015, Stan Wawrinka was indifferent about the attention on the feat heading into this year's Australian Open....
lead_paragraph: For someone who was the only man to beat world number one Novak Djokovic in a grand slam in 2015, Stan Wawrinka was indifferent about the attention on the feat heading into this year's Australian Open.

headline.print_headline: Wawrinka Indifferent to Impact of Djokovic Victory
headline.main: Wawrinka Indifferent to Impact of Djokovic Victory
